values.name: Messenger Post Media
values.description:
With a combination of superior reach, targeted delivery, and unique, award-winning content, Messenger Post Media can deliver your message to over 1/2 million readers like you. Nobody does ‘local’ like Messenger Post Media. No matter where you are in Greater Rochester, Messenger Post Media can work for you.

Products: 	
MPNnow.com, Daily Messenger, Penfield Post, Irondequoit Post, Webster Post, Brighton-Pittsford Post, Gates-Chili Post, Greece Post, Rush-Henrietta Post, Fairport-East Rochester Post and many more

ticketscript is Europe’s number one provider of self-ticketing software. It's a free-to-use solution and, unlike traditional event ticketing, empowers event organisers to take control of their sales and data. The service provides its customers with the tools and technology to sell more tickets directly to their audiences and communities in a highly targeted and profitable way. 

To date, over 10 million tickets have been sold through ticketscript, with over 50,000 events choosing the 
digital service and over £200 million generated in ticket revenues.

The organisation was founded in 2006 and has its head office in Amsterdam along with offices in London, Barcelona, Berlin and Antwerp. ticketscript is proud to work with a wide range of music events, festivals, trade fairs, exhibitions and sports events - including Hed Kandi, Ministry of Sound, Awakenings, MTV, Secret Cinema, WarChild, Berlin Music Week, Nature One, Groezrock, Euro Hockey League, Primavera Sound, Brighton & Hove Pride, Metro Club. 

www.ticketscript.com
www.facebook.com/ticketscript
twitter.com/ticketscript
values.name: ticketscript

values.description:
A&Q Partnership provides architectural and design solutions from offices in London, Brighton, Bourne End and Dorchester covering projects in the UK and Western Europe, together with our office in Hong Kong, covering Asia Pacific.

Founded in 1984, the Practice offers architecture that is dynamic, pragmatic and enjoyable, and is delivered within specified time and cost constraints.

Early projects included regeneration of existing pre-war residential estates in what was then the emerging Docklands area. Current projects include extensive residential developments for a variety of tenures.

Commissions from clients in different sectors have introduced the Practice to a broad range of building types, including Financial Services buildings where A&Q has developed a significant expertise in roll-out programmes, interior design, fit-out and corporate retail identity.

With over 50 staff led by five directors and seven associates, the Practice has a wide range of skills and experience that allows it to assemble design teams specially tailored to each project to provide a coherent path from project inception to completion.

A&Q embraces innovative use of technology across its offices to enable the Practice to perform as a single entity on projects throughout the UK and in mainland Europe.

Recent projects include several landmark schemes and a number of schemes that have won prestigious national and local awards.
values.name: A&Q Partnership
The Basement
values.description:
Located in the heart of Brighton, The Basement is the region’s leading purveyor of innovative and experimental performance. Presenting a programme of leading national and international artists alongside the Brighton’s most exciting experimental performers, The Basement is a vibrant hub for all things subversive and idiosyncratic.

The Basement supports a thriving community of Supported and Associated Artists who develop and present new work in the venue. With a range of unusual performance spaces we offer unique performance possibilities for artists and audiences.

We also provide a range of services and facilities to hire at very competitive rates.

values.name: Chilvers McCrea Healthcare
values.description:
ChilversMcCrea Healthcare is a leading provider of NHS Primary and Urgent Care across England, managing over 35 practices and 3 Walk in Centres. 

We are currently looking for experienced Practice Managers at three of our busy practices. Our current vacancies are located in London, Brighton and Reigate. 

We are looking for strong leaders with a strategic approach in order to continue the impressive developments the practice team has made in recent years. Good IT, budgetary and HR skills are essential, as is the ability to delegate and develop effective systems of work. The successful candidates will also be good communicators and will have the confidence to represent the practices’ interests across the locality and to work collaboratively with partnering organizations. 

Knowledge of general practice contracting and an ability to look at the wider primary care agenda such as Practice Based Commissioning would be an advantage.

ChilversMcCrea creates an environment for clinicians to focus on improving patient care and service development within an NHS environment. 

Further details can be found on our current vacancies pages of this website or to obtain full details and job descriptions or for an informal chat about the posts please contact Linda Triphook on 01992 565 011 or apply via email ltriphook@chilversmccrea.co.uk

We are the fasting growing residential painting contractor in Denver and the state of Colorado. Our success as painting contractors is due to the care and attention to detail we put in every job. We believe communication is the key to both happy customers and professional painting crews. It is important for us to set good expectations for our customers and insure they are being met with integrity and honesty, while house painting.

We do House Painting in all of the following areas: Denver, Aurora, Littleton, Englewood, Greenwood Village, Highlands Ranch, Centennial, Lakewood, Castle Rock, Parker, Lone Tree, Broomfield, Arvada, Thornton, Westminster, Brighton, Superior, Louisville and all of the Denver Colorado metro area.
values.name: Vivax Pro Painting- Always Hiring Exceptional People

values.description:
Wannops LLP is the fusion of long established firms of solicitors based in and around Chichester, Bognor Regis, Worthing, Littlehampton and Brighton including NLH Law and Marsh Ferriman.  The combined firms have been providing legal services in Sussex and Hampshire since 1882 for clients whether locally, in Europe or across the globe in the United States and Australasia.

The firm is the first choice for legal representation along the south coast for local and international businesses alike.   Individual and corporate clients get advice on a variety of practice areas in a way that matches their expectations.
values.name: Wannops LLP

values.description:
Skillsearch is a boutique IT recruitment agency with divisions specialising in ERP Systems (Oracle/SAP/Peoplesoft/Workday), Business Intelligence (Cognos/OBIEE/BO/MSBI) , SaaS technologies (Salesforce/Workday) and the Digital, Mobile and Gaming space with a strong emphasis on Unity3d 

We have extensive experience of placing candidates compliantly across Europe and can support clients in finding freelance or permanent staff.

More details on our skill set:

Peoplesoft - All Modules
OEBS - All modules
SAP - All Modules
SaaS - Workday, Salesforce
Business Intelligence - Including Cognos, OBIEE, Qlikview, BO, SQL BI
Digital Media - Including Python, Ruby, Mobile Apps, Unity3d, UI/UX, Augmented Reality, Digital Design, Digital Project Management
ETRM - Energy Trading and Risk Management Systems

For more information call our London or Brighton based niche recruitment teams.
values.name: Skillsearch Limited

values.description:
Boxharry is a specialist provider of websites and web-based application systems. We are skilled at plugging our technology into existing systems, providing additional content and functionality. 

Celebrating our 11th year; we are experienced in developing creative, cutting edge online communications for a wide variety of clients.

We take time to understand our clients’ needs and combine innovative technical features with intuitive usability.

Based in the vibrant lanes of Brighton, our team at Boxharry feed off the creativity and flair that surrounds us and use our expertise and experience to produce outstanding online solutions.

Boxharry provide:

•	Web design and development
•	Snapper - Content Management System (CMS) developed in ASP and .Net 4.0
•	Online Stores / E-Commerce sites
•	Web Apps - fully integrated solutions which enhance existing sites; improving user experience 
•	Social Media job post platforms - marketing facilities for recruiters and corporate HR.

For white label solutions, bespoke developments or any of the above please contact a member of the team directly for further details.
values.name: Boxharry Ltd

values.description:
GroundSure is a leading environmental information and consultancy business.

We provide market leading environmental searches to the UK property market and tailored environmental due diligence solutions for large property portfolios. Our clients have included some of the largest brownfiled land owners in the UK.

In partnership with Barclays Bank, GroundSure created the first environmental search report solution to become a mandated element within the standard lending procedures for a top UK Bank.  Whilst technical rigour is fundamental, understanding the commercial context into which environmental risk requires placing is of equal importance.

For the last 12 years environmental consultants have come to rely upon environmental data services in order to deliver their client services. With the INSIGHT product range, GroundSure is revolutionising this market by delivering new and alternative formats of data at highly competitive prices. Our background as consultants enables us to appreciate the requirements of the consultant at every step of the project.

GroundSure is part of 4C Group, an operating company of Top Right Group (formerly known as Emap), a business-to-business multiplatform media group, specialising in digital information services for the built environment, retail, fashion, public sector, automotive and media sectors.

GroundSure offices are based in Brighton (East Sussex).
values.name: GroundSure

values.description:
Epworth HealthCare is Victoria’s largest not-for-profit private health care group, renowned for excellence in diagnosis, treatment, care and rehabilitation. Epworth is an innovator in Australia’s health system, embracing the latest in evidence-based medicine to pioneer treatments and services for our patients. We invest all surplus funds back into training our staff, developing our facilities and purchasing the latest technology to keep us at the forefront of medical treatment.
 
We have eight hospitals in the Melbourne metropolitan area, including Epworth Richmond, Epworth Eastern, Epworth Freemasons, Epworth Cliveden, Epworth Hawthorn and Epworth Rehabilitation at Richmond, Brighton and Camberwell. In late 2015, we will open our new teaching hospital, Epworth Geelong, in partnership with Deakin University. We also operate a range of specialty clinics including the Women’s and Men’s Health Clinics, the Breast Clinic, Epworth HealthCheck and Epworth’s Specialist Centres. Epworth Pathology has collection centres at every Epworth site.
values.name: Epworth HealthCare

values.description:
With rich traditions and history, Adams County offers the best of suburban and rural life – vibrant cities, quiet towns and miles of recreation.  Located in northeastern Colorado, the county ranks among the top five largest counties in the state and is projected to be the fastest growing county in the metro Denver area over the next two decades. 

Adams County serves nearly 450,000 residents and includes the cities of Brighton, Commerce City, Federal Heights, Northglenn and Thornton; portions of Arvada, Aurora and Westminster; and the town of Bennett. Unincorporated communities include Henderson, Strasburg and Watkins. The county offers a professional business climate; a diverse labor pool; affordable land; a wide range of housing opportunities and community amenities; and boasts a high quality of life for residents.

For more information visit www.adcogov.org or follow us online:

Facebook – www.facebook.com/AdamsCountyGov
      Twitter – @AdamsCountyGov 
      Vimeo – www.vimeo.com/AdamsCountyGov
 Pinterest – www.pinterest.com/AdamsCountyGov
      Storify – www.storify.com/AdamsCountyGov
values.name: Adams County Government

values.description:
Fidelity Bank has been conducting business in the Pittsburgh area since 1927, when it opened on the North Side as the 27th Ward Savings and Loan Association. In those early years, the Bank was dedicated to promoting thrift and home ownership to residents in and around the Brighton Road area of the city.

Today, Fidelity Bank is a full-service community bank offering a complete range of financial products and services to residents and small businesses of the Pittsburgh area and surrounding suburbs. Fidelity Bank has 13 neighborhood locations ready to serve you, reaching from Zelienople in the north to Mt. Lebanon in the south.

For over 75 years, we have been true to our name—faithful to our customers, and committed to building strong customer relationships by offering a wide range of high quality, fairly priced services delivered in an efficient and convenient manner.

Fidelity Bank also recognizes the importance of providing individualized customer service. Our staff makes every effort to respond quickly and effectively to your ever-changing needs. And, we add the personal touch that only a community bank can provide.
values.name: Fidelity Bank, PaSB

values.description:
Based in Brighton, we offer a variety of web design and development services. Our services include: ecommerce shopping cart systems, content management systems, hosting, search engine optimisation (SEO), Internet marketing, custom PHP development and graphic design.

We have a wealth of experience in both design and development. All of our sites are custom made by experienced graphic designers and hand coded using HTML, PHP and actionscript. Whether you are looking for a simple website or a dynamic site we can help, with everything from graphic design to database development.

We specialise in web site design for creative individuals and businesses.
values.name: Bozboz

values.description:
Sussex Wildlife Trust is the leading conservation charity working in East Sussex, West Sussex and Brighton. We look after over 3000 acres of downland, woodland, wetland and heath. Our work also includes environmental education, working with land owners, companies and local communities to conserve Sussex.
Please join our LinkedIn Group: http://linkd.in/SussexWildlife
values.name: Sussex Wildlife Trust

values.description:
LaVida Massage was founded in 2007 in Brighton, Mich. with the goal to improve health and wellness, reduce stress and provide an elegant atmosphere at which to find ultimate relaxation and rejuvenation for the mind and body.
 
With the health and wellness industry on the rise, and the with an increased emphasis on maintaining and nurturing personal health and well being, LaVida identified a need for a massage company that would exceed expectations for massage services at reasonable price points. 
 
Now in several locations across the country, LaVida Massage centers are open seven days a week and are always conveniently located. Each offers an inviting and gender-neutral environment; certified male and female massage therapists; and ease in online appointment booking. With over 130 sessions available each day, LaVida is always ready to accommodate busy schedules and to serve as a relaxing escape from an otherwise hectic day.
 
Please visit www.lavidamassage.com for more information and to find the LaVida location nearest you.
values.name: LaVida Massage

values.description:
During 70 years of local ownership, Lillie Suburban Newspapers has grown to serve 25 metro communities as the leading source of local community news, printing and distributing over 118,000 award winning newspaper to our loyal readers.

Proudly serving the communities of North St. Paul, Maplewood, White Bear Lake, Mahtomedi, Oakdale, Lake Elmo, New Brighton, Shoreview, Mounds View, Arden Hills, Vadnais Heights, North Oaks, St. Anthony, Roseville, Little Canada, Lauderdale, Falcon Heights, East St. Paul, Woodbury, South Maplewood, South St. Paul, West St. Paul, Mendota Heights, Inver Grove Heights, Mendota, Lilydale, and Sunfish Lake.

Our mission is to serve the communities by bridging the communication needs of readers, businesses and organizations. This mission is accomplished through the teamwork of our professional staff, who are dedicated to truth, integrity, loyalty, quality and hard work.

The values that drive our company include providing a high degree of quality and value in our content, products and services and offering a wide array of supporting products. We believe in offering our customers high quality printing services with a solid, timely distribution system. We believe in strong newspapers that build strong communities.
values.name: Lillie Suburban Newspapers, Inc.

values.description: Brighton College offers our students the opportunity to develop high-quality, in-demand, professional skills that are recognized and needed in the workplace. We help our students, who come from a variety of backgrounds and abilities, to improve their lifestyle through targeted education. This education is the foundation for our reputation for excellence in the academic community.
values.name: Vancouver Central college

values.description:
Headquartered in Brighton, MI, SVT provides the design, installation, operation, monitoring and service of turn-key commercial audio systems, video distribution systems, control systems, digital signage networks, conferencing and multimedia systems, video security and video production systems. Each solution is custom designed and installed according to each client’s individual needs and budget. ...We have an extensive track record of providing solutions on-time and with the highest level of customer satisfaction. 

Our team consists of industry certified engineers with years of experience in the design and commissioning of the products we specify. SVT employs over 100 technicians, with operations in dozens of locations throughout North America. Our technical staff is available to our clients and end-users 24-hours a day, 7-days a week, with telephone, on-site and remote support capabilities.
values.name: Sport View Technologies (SVT)

values.description:
The Christchurch Polytechnic Institute of Technology is one of the South Island’s largest tertiary institutes, attracting more than 24 000 innovative and exciting learners from our own shores and across the globe.
For over 100 years we’ve enjoyed an outstanding reputation for well-structured and flexible programmes that respond to employer and student needs.

Our lecturers and tutors are chosen for expertise in their field and share their knowledge, practical experience and industry connections with students to ensure they graduate work ready from day one.

We have two main campuses in Christchurch: Madras Street and the Trades Innovation Institute on Sullivan Avenue. 

As part of our commitment to encouraging access to computing education throughout our local community, we also have four Campus Connect branches in Hornby, Bishopdale, New Brighton and Rangiora.
values.name: CPIT (Christchurch Polytechnic Institute of Technology)
